members.signatureBeforeChange: public void runOperation(JavaModelOperation operation, IProgressMonitor monitor) throws JavaModelException
members.signatureAfterChange: public void runOperation(JavaModelOperation operation, IProgressMonitor monitor) throws JavaModelException
diff: -			// fire only if there were no awaiting deltas (if there were, they would come from a resource modifying operation)
-			// and the operation has not modified any resource
+			// fire only if the operation has not modified any resource

members.signatureBeforeChange: public void runOperation(JavaModelOperation operation, IProgressMonitor monitor) throws JavaModelException
members.signatureAfterChange: public void runOperation(JavaModelOperation operation, IProgressMonitor monitor) throws JavaModelException
diff: -			// fire only if the operation has not modified any resource
+			// - the operation did produce some delta(s)
+			// - but the operation has not modified any resource
